pages.text: $(li)The Ice Armor is quiet better than the $(l:patchouli:armors/cactus_armor)Cactus Armor$(/l), $(l:patchouli:armors/melon_armor)Melon Armor$(/l), and $(l:patchouli:armors/pumpkin_armor)Pumpkin Armor$(/l).$(br)$(li)If you wear the complete set, you will get Frost Walker effect.$(br)$(li)This effect makes you to turn the water into Frosted Ice when you walk near of it.

pages.name: Ice Armor
pages.text: You will be inmune to damage of Magma Blocks and Campfires when you are stepped on of them too.
